entry.title: Paris Tack Three Sided Premium Slow Feeder Hay Bag with Super Tough Bottom and 6 Month Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Paris Tack
Type: Hay Bags
Price: 34.99

Paris Tack’s line of slow feed hay bags has been meticulously designed, tested, and improved over the past 15 years in order to give you a product superior to anything else available on the market. Our unique web front hay bags are designed with cross stitches at every intersection and bartack stitching at all stress points along the top, sides, and bottom of the bag. This hay bag also features our exclusive Super Tough Bottom®: a grid of reinforced nylon webbing that will never rip like solid or mesh bottoms. Our bags are built tough from premium materials and are designed to last for years to come. This hay bag is designed to be a great everyday feeder for most horses and other animals: it measures 22x10x28" and can hold about 2-3 flakes of hay. This hay bag has 3x2” rectangular front openings which will prevent hay wastage and slow down their rate of consumption, but still allow for frustration-free feeding. This premium hay bag also includes a 6-month limited manufacturer's warranty offered by Derby Originals.

  • HOLDS 2-3 FLAKES OF HAY - this 22x10x28" hay bag with 3x2” rectangular openings holds approx. 2-3 flakes of Timothy, Orchard, Alfalfa, or any other type of hay. Our hay bags were designed to minimize frustration and can be stuffed in seconds.
  • SUPER TOUGH BOTTOM® DESIGN - our exclusive Super Tough Bottom® is made of reinforced overlapping nylon webbing. This design allows for superior strength and durability while keeping your hay fresh and allowing dust and debris to exit the bag.
  • DURABLE LASTING CONSTRUCTION - our heavy-duty reinforced nylon hay bag has replaceable hanging straps and snaps. This allows you to easily replace worn parts, extending the life of the bag. Many customers say their hay bag has lasted 3+ years!
  • IMPROVES DIGESTION - horses are designed to spend up to 18 hours a day grazing. Slow feeding allows you to replicate this natural behavior and is recommended by veterinarians to prevent gastric ulcers, colic, and boredom-related behavioral vices.
  • SIX MONTH WARRANTY - this hay bag has a 6-month limited manufacturer's warranty offered by Derby Originals. This warranty covers manufacturing defects. Accidental damage or wear and tear is not covered. Contact the manufacturer for more information.

entry.title: Paris Tack Large Supreme Slow Feeder Horse Hay Bag with Super Tough Bottom and 1 Year Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Paris Tack
Type: Hay Bags
Price: 64.99

Derby Originals is the original inventor of the 4-sided hay bag, U.S. Patent No. D742,078. Our four-sided hay bags are the only bags on the market that allow your horse to freely eat from any part of the hay bag. These patented hay bags are the result of years of careful study and testing to create a design that is attractive, functional, durable, high-quality, and preferred by horses. Our bags are constructed of reinforced nylon webbing that is stronger and more durable than any mesh or fabric hay bag. These bags are designed with cross stitches at every intersection and bartack stitching at all stress points along the top, sides, and bottom of the bag. This hay bag also features our exclusive Super Tough Bottom®: a grid of reinforced nylon webbing that will never rip like solid or mesh bottoms. Our bags are built tough from premium materials and are designed to last for years to come. This hay bag is designed to be a great everyday feeder for most horses and other animals: it measures 32x12x24" and can hold 1 bale of hay. This hay bag has 1.75” square openings which will prevent hay wastage and slow down their rate of consumption, but still allow for frustration-free feeding. This premium hay bag also includes a 1-year limited manufacturer's warranty offered by Derby Originals.

  • HOLDS 1 BALE OF HAY - this 32x12x24" hay bag with 1.75” square openings can hold 1 bale of Timothy, Orchard, Alfalfa, or any other type of hay. Our hay bags were designed to minimize frustration and can be stuffed in seconds.
  • EXCLUSIVE PATENTED 4-SIDED CONSTRUCTION - this hay bag features Derby Originals patented nylon web design that allows your horse to eat from any part of the hay bag. This design eliminates the risk of material rips and tears found in other hay bags.
  • SUPER TOUGH BOTTOM® DESIGN - our exclusive Super Tough Bottom® is made of reinforced overlapping nylon webbing. This design allows for superior strength and durability while keeping your hay fresh and allowing dust and debris to exit the bag.
  • IMPROVES DIGESTION - horses are designed to spend up to 18 hours a day grazing. Slow feeding allows you to replicate this natural behavior and is recommended by veterinarians to prevent gastric ulcers, colic, and boredom-related behavioral vices.
  • ONE YEAR WARRANTY - this hay bag has a 1-year limited manufacturer's warranty offered by Derby Originals. This warranty covers manufacturing defects. Accidental damage or wear and tear is not covered. Contact the manufacturer for more information.

Vendor: cuteNfuzzy

This hay bag features a mesh ventilation window on both side gussets to promote airflow, prevent moisture buildup, and allow dust to exit the hay while also preventing pests from getting into your hay.

entry.title: Derby Originals Nylon Hay Bag with Mesh Ventilation Windows and Ties on Top with Six Month Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Hay Bags
Price: 22.95

FEATURES NEW MESH VENTILATION WINDOWS - this hay bag features a mesh ventilation window on both side gussets to promote airflow, prevent moisture buildup, and allow dust to exit the hay while also preventing pests from getting into your hay.

STURDY LIGHTWEIGHT CONSTRUCTION – these hay bags are made of durable nylon material with reinforced stitching at every seam and are designed to be used both indoors or outdoors.

NEW TOP-CLOSURE DESIGN - unlike regular hay bags that have an open top that cannot be closed, our hay bag features a tie on either side that allows you to close up the top of the bag to prevent horses from pulling excess hay out.

EASY TO HANG – this hay bag features a pair of d-rings at the top which allows these hay bags to easily be hung using rope or snaps, hung in a stall or from a fence, inside a trailer, or whichever way you prefer!

GENEROUS SIZING – these hay bags are generously sized and perfect for use in the stall, trailer, at pasture, or at a show due to their large sizing at 19" L x 19" H x 12" W.

entry.title: cuteNfuzzy Easy Feed Small Pet Hanging Hay Bag for Guinea Pigs and Rabbits
entry.summary:
Vendor: cuteNfuzzy
Type: Small Animal Supplies
Price: 18.95

CuteNfuzzy's line of small pet hay feeders first premiered in 2019 and were meticulously designed and tested here in the USA. We're proud to have created a line of attractive, high-quality, innovative, long-lasting, and best-selling hay feeders designed for use with any small animal such as guinea pigs, rabbits, chinchillas, degus, and even reptiles such as tortoises! These bags are designed for easy, hassle-free, waste-free, and mess-free hay feeding. Unlike traditional wooden, plastic, or metal hay feeders that are intrusive, heavy, hard to fill, and can become dangerous for your pet, our feeders are completely safe and easy to use.

Each of our small pet hay bags features a pair of high-quality stainless steel trigger snaps that make hanging this bag a breeze, as well as a d-ring on the back so you can anchor the bag to your cage wall to prevent your pet from moving or flipping it. Our bags also have a full velcro closing top to prevent hay spillage. You'll love how much less hay is wasted and how much cleaner your pet's cage stays with our hay bags! Our feeders were designed to be as hygienic as possible by keeping your hay dry and unsoiled. These bags are also easy to clean and feature a waterproof inner lining. All of the seams on these bags are sturdily reinforced for maximum longevity.

Small animals have teeth that never stop growing, so they need to constantly chew in order to keep their teeth from becoming overgrown. Some pets are heavier chewers than others, and while most will not chew fabric, some pets may shred, rip, or eat fabric. For the pets who do this, we do not recommend the use of a fabric hay bag for them as they could try to ingest the fabric. Please take your pet’s individual personality, needs, and safety into consideration when choosing a hay feeder for them. We recommend keeping your hay bag full and not letting it become empty for lengths of time in order to lessen the risk of them eating the fabric. If your hay bag becomes damaged, immediately discontinue using it.

  • DESIGNED WITH YOUR PETS SAFETY IN MIND - this hay bag features an all-fabric durable nylon web design with 1.25" x 2" openings for increased safety, comfort for your pet, and durability. Our hay bags were proudly designed in the USA and tested extensively.
  • PERFECT FOR GUINEA PIGS, RABBITS, CHINCHILLAS, AND MORE - these hay bags were designed for use with a wide variety of hay eating small animals. Our hay bags are sized to hold a generous amount of hay, and are safe for every day and long-term use.
  • NOT DESIGNED FOR HEAVY CHEWERS - some small pets will chew/eat fabric. For these pets, we recommend that you do not use a fabric hay feeder as they may try to ingest the fabric. Always monitor your pet and remove the hay bag if it becomes damaged.
  • EXCLUSIVE SUPER TOUGH BOTTOM DESIGN - originally designed for horses, this bottom is more durable and keeps hay fresher by providing better air flow and allowing dust to exit your pet's hay. This also makes accessing the hay easier for your pet.
  • AVAILABLE IN MULTIPLE SIZES AND COLORS - this hay pouch is available in two sizes: Small (10" long x 11" tall x 3” wide) and Large (15" long x 11" tall x 3” wide), and the colors Black, Hurricane Blue, Pink, and Dark Purple to best suit you and your pet's needs!

entry.title: CuteNfuzzy Small Pet Medium Hay Bag for Guinea Pigs and Rabbits with 6 Month Warranty 18x11x1.5"
entry.summary:
Vendor: cuteNfuzzy
Type: Small Animal Supplies
Price: 16.99

CuteNfuzzy's line of small pet hay feeders first premiered in 2019 and were meticulously designed and tested here in the USA. We're proud to have created a line of attractive, high-quality, innovative, long-lasting, and best-selling hay feeders designed for use with any small animal such as guinea pigs, rabbits, chinchillas, degus, and even reptiles such as tortoises! These bags are designed for easy, hassle-free, waste-free, and mess-free hay feeding. Unlike traditional wooden, plastic, or metal hay feeders that are intrusive, heavy, hard to fill, and can become dangerous for your pet, our feeders are completely safe and easy to use.

Each of our small pet hay bags features a pair of high-quality stainless steel trigger snaps that make hanging this bag a breeze, as well as a d-ring on the back so you can anchor the bag to your cage wall to prevent your pet from moving or flipping it. Our bags also have a full velcro closing top to prevent hay spillage. You'll love how much less hay is wasted and how much cleaner your pet's cage stays with our hay bags! Our feeders were designed to be as hygienic as possible by keeping your hay dry and unsoiled. These bags are also easy to clean and feature a waterproof inner lining. All of the seams on these bags are sturdily reinforced for maximum longevity.

Small animals have teeth that never stop growing, so they need to constantly chew in order to keep their teeth from becoming overgrown. Some pets are heavier chewers than others, and while most will not chew fabric, some pets may shred, rip, or eat fabric. For the pets who do this, we do not recommend the use of a fabric hay bag for them as they could try to ingest the fabric. Please take your pet’s individual personality, needs, and safety into consideration when choosing a hay feeder for them. We recommend keeping your hay bag full and not letting it become empty for lengths of time in order to lessen the risk of them eating the fabric. If your hay bag becomes damaged, immediately discontinue using it.

 

  • DESIGNED WITH YOUR PETS SAFETY IN MIND - this hay bag features an all-fabric durable 1000D nylon design with large openings for increased safety, comfort for your pet, and durability. Our hay bags were proudly designed in the USA and tested extensively.
  • PERFECT FOR GUINEA PIGS, RABBITS, CHINCHILLAS, AND MORE - these hay bags were designed for use with a wide variety of hay eating small animals. Our hay bags are sized to hold a generous amount of hay, and are safe for every day and long-term use.
  • NOT DESIGNED FOR HEAVY CHEWERS - some small pets will chew/eat fabric. For these pets, we recommend that you do not use a fabric hay feeder as they may try to ingest the fabric. Always monitor your pet and remove the hay bag if it becomes damaged.
  • MEASURES 18" LONG x 11" TALL x 1.5" WIDE - this hay bag is sized to perfectly fit inside most cages and comfortably accommodate 1-4 small pets. This feeder features four front 1.75" wide by 3.75" tall openings to allow up to four animals to eat at once.
  • AVAILABLE IN MULTIPLE COLORS AND PATTERNS - our fun and colorful small pet hay feeders are available in the colors Black, Hurricane Blue, Pink, Purple, Green, and Rainbow Geometry so that you can find the perfect bag to match your pet's cage.

entry.title: Derby Originals Scratchless Slow Feed Horse Hay Bag with Super Tough Bottom and Six Month Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Hay Bags
Price: 29.95

If you’re looking for a high-quality, stunning hay bag for your barn, pasture, or trailer, this new Derby Originals Drawstring Scratchless No Hardware Top Load Horse Hay Bag with New Super-Tough Bottom is the perfect choice. This hay bag is made with the same premium features as our other top loading hay bags, including a sturdy high-quality velcro closure, reinforced stitching, and a heavy duty nylon construction, but features an innovative new hardware free design that makes this a safe option for use in trailers. This hay bag has a large capacity when compared to other scratchless designs and measures 24.5" x 9.5" x 21.5" in size with 3.5” square front openings. This hay bag can comfortably hold around 3-5 flakes of hay.

EASY HANG DRAWSTRING TOP - this hay bag features a sturdy drawstring rope for easy and adjustable hanging in the stall, trailer, or in the pasture. This hay bag also features a bottom stabilizing strap to prevent your horse from tossing the hay bag or twisting it.

HOLDS 3-5 FLAKES - these 24.5x9.5x21.5” large hay bag will hold approx. 3-5 flakes of hay, depending on the hay type and flake size, and how dense the hay is packed. These bags are rated to last the average horse about 30 hours or more.

NO HARDWARE DESIGN - this hay bag features a high-quality hardware free construction that was designed to maximize safety, and prevent scratching and damage to your trailer or stall wall.

PERFECT FOR THE TRAILER - this easy to hang hay bag was designed with trailer use in mind and features a no-scratch drawstring top, and a bottom reinforcement strap that allows you to properly secure the bag to your trailer.

DESIGNED FOR HORSES AND OTHER LIVESTOCK - this hay bag features 3.5” square openings that are designed to allow horses of all sizes and livestock animals such as sheep,  goats, and cattle to freely eat.

entry.title: Derby Originals XL Super Tough Slow Feed Hay Bag with 1 Year Warranty and Patented Four Sided Design
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Hay Bags
Price: 84.95

Derby Originals Patented Four Sided Hay Bags are Designed with Your Horse’s Comfort in Mind. Our hay bags are the only hay bags on the market that allow your horse to eat freely from any side of the hay bag. Derby Originals holds the patent, U.S. Patent No. D742,078., for this innovative feature. Our brand is the world’s only brand with a completely open four-sided design that allows for optimum ease of feeding, air flow, preventing hay rot, and allowing for easy in-bag soaking. We are also proud to be the first company to offer a one year warranty on hay bags. Our patented hay bags are the result of years of careful study and testing with horses to create a design that is attractive, functional, durable, high-quality, and preferred by horses. Our hay bags are made of a strong 1200D double-layered nylon that is UV resistant, can withstand high temperatures, is mildew-resistant, and dries quickly. With a large line of size options, opening size options, colors, and styles, we have a patented hay bag designed to suit every horse!

EXCLUSIVE PATENTED DESIGN - our patented four-sided design allows your horse to comfortably eat from any part of this hay bag while also offering superior airflow and allowing dust and debris to exit the hay without creating excess waste.

HELPS TO SUPPORT GOOD DIGESTION - our hay bags replicate natural and healthy grazing patterns by slowing down your horse’s rate of hay consumption to both decrease hay waste and help prevent digestion issues such as potentially deadly colic.

HEAVY-DUTY CONSTRUCTION - our hay bag is made of super tough double-layered 1200D nylon and features premium hardware and straps and reinforced stitching that allows it to withstand whatever forces your horse exerts on it.

THE IDEAL SLOW FEEDER - this 46x26x12” hay bag features uniform 2” square openings which allow your horse to eat comfortably at a more natural pace that mimics grazing. Our hay bags are ideal for helping to prevent colic or digestive upset.

ONE YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER’S WARRANTY - this product comes with a one-year limited manufacturer's warranty that protects against manufacturing and quality defects. This warranty does not cover accidental damage.

entry.title: Derby Originals Large 1000D Nylon Horse Hay Bag with 6 Month Warranty and Reflective Design
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Hay Bags
Price: 14.95

Based on customer feedback on their economic hay bag lines, Derby Originals has developed a heavy duty standard run of the mill hay bag. This is for those of us that are looking for a standard hay bag that is built to last. An added bonus of a reflective trim adds an element of safety for dark conditions.

  • Constructed with heavy duty 1000 denier
  • Unique reflective trim around opening for added safety & visibility
  • Reinforced seam stitching for durability
  • Two large O-Rings at the top of the bag
  • O-Ring and loop on back to tie down bag for extra stability
  • Perfect for trailers and stalls
  • 18.5" x 19" x 12"

Colors:

  • Royal Blue/Black
  • Charcoal/Purple
  • Orange/Black
  • Red/Black

entry.title: Derby Originals XL Go Around Slow Feeder Horse Hay Bag with Super Tough Bottom and 1 Year Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Hay Bags
Price: 89.99

 

Derby Originals is the original inventor of the 4-sided hay bag, U.S. Patent No. D742,078. Our four-sided hay bags are the only bags on the market that allow your horse to freely eat from any part of the hay bag. These patented hay bags are the result of years of careful study and testing to create a design that is attractive, functional, durable, high-quality, and preferred by horses. Our bags are constructed of reinforced nylon webbing that is stronger and more durable than any mesh or fabric hay bag. These bags are designed with cross stitches at every intersection and bartack stitching at all stress points along the top, sides, and bottom of the bag. This hay bag also features our exclusive Super Tough Bottom®: a grid of reinforced nylon webbing that will never rip like solid or mesh bottoms. Our bags are built tough from premium materials and are designed to last for years to come. This hay bag is designed to be a great everyday feeder for most horses and other animals: it measures 19x19x41" and can hold 1 bale of hay. This hay bag has 1.75” square openings which will prevent hay wastage and slow down their rate of consumption, but still allow for frustration-free feeding. This premium hay bag also includes a 1-year limited manufacturer's warranty offered by Derby Originals.

  • HOLDS 1 BALE OF HAY - this 19x19x41" hay bag with 1.75" square openings holds approx. 1 bale of Timothy, Orchard, Alfalfa, or any other type of hay. Our hay bags were designed to minimize frustration and can be stuffed in seconds.
  • EXCLUSIVE PATENTED 4-SIDED CONSTRUCTION - this hay bag features Derby Originals patented nylon web design that allows your horse to eat from any part of the hay bag. This design eliminates the risk of material rips and tears found in other hay bags.
  • SUPER TOUGH BOTTOM® DESIGN - our exclusive Super Tough Bottom® is made of reinforced overlapping nylon webbing. This design allows for superior strength and durability while keeping your hay fresh and allowing dust and debris to exit the bag.
  • IMPROVES DIGESTION - horses are designed to spend up to 18 hours a day grazing. Slow feeding allows you to replicate this natural behavior and is recommended by veterinarians to prevent gastric ulcers, colic, and boredom-related behavioral vices.
  • ONE YEAR WARRANTY - this hay bag has a 1-year limited manufacturer's warranty offered by Derby Originals. This warranty covers manufacturing defects. Accidental damage or wear and tear is not covered. Contact the manufacturer for more information.

entry.title: Derby Originals Go Around Hanging Slow Feed Horse Hay Bag with 6 Month Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Hay Bags
Price: 37.95

 

Derby Originals’ line of hay and bale bags and hay nets have been individually tailored to meet the needs of horses and other equines (donkeys, mules, etc.), and livestock such as sheep and goats, cattle, alpacas and llamas, and even small mammals such as rabbits and guinea pigs.

 


  • OPEN SIDED - this hanging hay bag is unique in that it is completely open and designed to work from any angle, making it ideal for feeding multiple animals at once or for providing a more open and accessible hay source.
  • EASY TO FILL AND HANG - these hay bags have a fully opening top which makes filling them incredibly easy and stress-free, and they’re easily hung with the included 7.5’ long heavy-duty fixed loop poly rope strap. Simply tie the strap to a sturdy object at a comfortable height for your horses and you’re set!
  • GREAT FOR PASTURE USE - because of this bag’s incredible durability and open design, it’s perfect for use in the pasture where multiple animals will be eating and where you don’t want excess waste.
  • NOT JUST FOR HORSES - this hay bag has been designed to work for other types of livestock as well as horses, from sheep and goats to cattle, donkeys, llamas, alpacas, and more!
  • FOUR ATTRACTIVE COLORS - our Go Around hay bags are available in four fun colors: Pink, Black, Lime Green, and Purple.

entry.title: Nylon Easy Feed Top Load Hay Bags by Derby Originals Super Sale
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Hay Bags
Price: 24.95

Keep your horse fat and happy with less waste. Large opening makes filling these hay bags easier. Durable, long lasting, yet light for transport. Perfect for traveling or taking to shows. Easy to hang and easy to load.
  • Top load bag has large foldover flap (14" L x 13" W), and flap fastens with Velcro closure on top
  • Top strap attaches with bull clip and rings
  • Back of bag has ring and cross-stitched reinforced loop for tying down bag
  • Mesh bottom retains hay, allows dirt to fall through bottom
  • Size: 23" X 19" X 10"
  • Large opening for easy, clean feeding (9.5" H x 7.5" W)
